function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to high CO2 levels","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Ensure natural ventilation and use of appropriate filters to reduce the risk of disease transmission","Technologies":"Natural ventilation systems, MERV 13 filters","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Unsafe drinking water due to contamination","Impact":"Risk of waterborne disease outbreak, especially during a pandemic","Mitigation":"Use of high-performing ultrafiltration or nanomembrane filters, regular testing and monitoring for pathogens","Technologies":"Ultrafiltration, nanomembrane filters, pathogen testing technology","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring of outdoor environmental conditions","Impact":"Inability to detect unsafe outdoor conditions and protect residents from environmental hazards","Mitigation":"Installation of outdoor air monitoring stations within 1.6 km proximity, live data alerts for residents","Technologies":"Outdoor air monitoring stations, alert notification systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"}]}
